name: AI-Automated Customer Service Based On Email

parameters.name: markSeen
parameters.label: Mark message(s) as read when fetched

messages.content:
Categorize the following email '{{1.text}}' into following categories:
1. Sales Enquiry
2. Customer Feedback
3. Complaint

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)
